sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import styled from "styled-components"
import {Container, Button} from "react-bootstrap"

//components
import {BodyContentCard, BodyBigHeading, BodyContentCardContainer, BodyLittleHeading} from "../index"

const ContainerRow = styled(Container)`
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: space-between;
    height: auto;
    width: 100%;
`
const ContainerColumn = styled(Container)`
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-content: center;
`
const CardOne = styled(BodyContentCard)`
    transform: rotate(-20deg);

`
const CardThree = styled(BodyContentCard)`
    transform: rotate(30deg);
`

export const HowToSection = () => {
    return (
        <>
                    <BodyContentCard>

            <ContainerRow>
                <CardOne style={{width: "30%"}}>
                    <BodyContentCardContainer>
                        <BodyBigHeading style={{fontSize: "80%"}}>1. Purchase a Vault</BodyBigHeading>
                        <hr></hr>
                        <BodyLittleHeading style={{fontSize: "60%"}}>
                            Purchase a vault from the marketplace to get started.  Each Vault has a unique trading algorithm, you can check it's details to larn more.
                        </BodyLittleHeading>
                        <BodyLittleHeading style={{color: "#fbdb37", fontWeight: "600"}}>
                            Easy right? 
                        </BodyLittleHeading>
                    </BodyContentCardContainer>
                </CardOne>

                <BodyContentCard style={{width: "30%"}}>
                    <BodyContentCardContainer>
                        <BodyBigHeading style={{fontSize: "80%"}}>Accumulator Distributor</BodyBigHeading>
                        <hr></hr>
                        <BodyLittleHeading style={{fontSize: "60%"}}>
                            Our smart contract is built on the principals of institutional algorithmic investing. Accumulate tokens at low prices and Distribute them at higher prices.
                        </BodyLittleHeading>
                        <BodyLittleHeading style={{color: "#fbdb37", fontWeight: "600"}}>
                            Easy right? 
                        </BodyLittleHeading>
                    </BodyContentCardContainer>
                </BodyContentCard>

                <CardThree style={{width: "30%"}}>
                    <BodyContentCardContainer>
                        <BodyBigHeading style={{fontSize: "60%"}}>Accumulator Distributor</BodyBigHeading>
                        <hr></hr>
                        <BodyLittleHeading style={{fontSize: "60%"}}>
                            Our smart contract is built on the principals of institutional algorithmic investing. Accumulate tokens at low prices and Distribute them at higher prices.
                        </BodyLittleHeading>
                        <BodyLittleHeading style={{color: "#fbdb37", fontWeight: "600"}}>
                            Easy right? 
                        </BodyLittleHeading>
                    </BodyContentCardContainer>
                </CardThree>
            </ContainerRow>
            </BodyContentCard>

        </>
    )
}

export default HowToSection
